classics.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
classics.Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

classics.Title: The Godfather
classics.Plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

classics.Title: The Dark Knight
classics.Plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

classics.Title: Forrest Gump
classics.Plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

classics.Title: Fight Club
classics.Plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
